mapper.select: SELECT MAX(id) AS MAX_ID FROM xxl_job_info

SELECT *, JSON_VALUE(executor_param, '$.planKey') as 'plan_key' from ( SELECT id , job_group , job_desc , add_time , update_time , author , alarm_email , schedule_type , schedule_conf , misfire_strategy , executor_route_strategy , executor_handler , executor_param , executor_block_strategy , executor_timeout , executor_fail_retry_count , glue_type , glue_source , glue_remark , glue_updatetime , child_jobid , trigger_status , trigger_last_time , trigger_next_time FROM xxl_job_info where executor_handler = 'RobotHandle') t where #{planKey} is null or #{planKey} = '' or JSON_VALUE(executor_param, '$.planKey') = #{planKey}
